page.title: 10HEALTH-WEST NOTTINGHAM.
page.content: GENERAL HEALTH. A street survey showed that most people are satisfied with main health facilities but local facilities could be better. More dentists, chemists and toilets were favoured. Mental health treatment will be provided locally at Roseberry house and 78% are in favour. 2 local hospitals care for the elderly. Long waiting lists for operations were mentioned as not satisfactory and more nurses are required. DENTAL HEALTH. Out of a class of 27 children, only two enjoy going to the dentist. 8 children have braces to straighten their teeth. Silver, tin and mercury are used for fillings, or gold. The dentist says the mercury is not dangerous when mixed.
